title: SLOW COOKER MISSISSIPPI MUDD ROAST
directions: Put roast in the crock pot. Sprinkle Hidden Valley ranch dressing on top. Sprinkle McCormick Au Jus mix on top.
Place a stick of butter on top of that.
Put about 5 pepperoncini peppers on top.
(You buy them in a jar near the pickles) You do not have to eat them and they do not make it spicy ;)
